 *  Eclipse is used as Java IDE

 *  After set up the project in Eclipse, you need to install a local Reactome database for easy test. You can download a public release database from http://www.reactome.org/download.

 *  Start testing with these two methods in class org.reactome.sgml.ReactomeToGPMLConverter. You may have to provide your correct database connection information for class MySQLAdaptor().

       ** testSingleConvert()

      ** testConvert()
